name: Breast Pump
specifications: Manual or electric device; made of medical-grade plastic; includes flange, collection bottle, and suction mechanism.
function: Extracts breast milk from lactating mothers for storage or feeding.
usage: Wash hands and assemble pump; position flange over nipple, create seal, and follow pump instructions for suction and milk collection.
maintenance: Sterilize all parts after each use; do not share between users; check for cracks or wear in parts.
warning: Insufficient cleaning, incorrect flange size causing discomfort, or improper assembly.
